verses.verse: אָ֚נָה <S%H575><s%> Where הָלַ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> gone דּוֹדֵ֔ךְ <S%H1730><s%> Whither is thy beloved הַיָּפָ֖ה <S%H3303><s%> O thou fairest בַּנָּשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> ess אָ֚נָה <S%H575><s%> Where פָּנָ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> turned aside דוֹדֵ֔ךְ <S%H1730><s%> has your beloved וּנְבַקְשֶׁ֖נּוּ <S%H1245><s%> ? that we may seek עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

דּוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> My beloved יָרַ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> is gone down לְגַנּ֔וֹ <S%H1588><s%> into his garden לַעֲרוּג֖וֹת <S%H6170><s%> to the beds הַבֹּ֑שֶׂם <S%H1314><s%> of spices לִרְעוֹת֙ <S%H7462><s%> to feed בַּגַּנִּ֔ים <S%H1588><s%> in the gardens וְלִלְקֹ֖ט <S%H3950><s%> and to gather שֽׁוֹשַׁנִּֽים׃ <S%H7799><s%> lilies

אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I am לְדוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> I [am] my beloved's וְדוֹדִ֣י <S%H1730><s%> and my beloved לִ֔י הָרֹעֶ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> [is] mine he feedeth בַּשּׁוֹשַׁנִּֽים׃ <S%H7799><s%> among the lilies ס

יָפָ֨ה <S%H3303><s%> Thou [art] beautiful אַ֤תְּ <S%H859><s%> you רַעְיָתִי֙ <S%H7474><s%> O my love כְּתִרְצָ֔ה <S%H8656><s%> as Tirzah נָאוָ֖ה <S%H5000><s%> comely כִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> as Jerusalem אֲיֻמָּ֖ה <S%H366><s%> terrible כַּנִּדְגָּלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1713><s%> as [an army] with banners

הָסֵ֤בִּי <S%H5437><s%> Turn away עֵינַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes מִנֶּגְדִּ֔י <S%H5048><s%> for שֶׁ֥הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> from me for they הִרְהִיבֻ֑נִי <S%H7292><s%> have overcome שַׂעְרֵךְ֙ <S%H8181><s%> me thy hair כְּעֵ֣דֶר <S%H5739><s%> [is] as a flock הָֽעִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> of goats שֶׁגָּלְשׁ֖וּ <S%H1570><s%> that appear מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> from Gilead

שִׁנַּ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H8127><s%> Thy teeth כְּעֵ֣דֶר <S%H5739><s%> [are] as a flock הָֽרְחֵלִ֔ים <S%H7353><s%> of sheep שֶׁעָל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> which go up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> up הָרַחְצָ֑ה <S%H7367><s%> from the washing שֶׁכֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> All מַתְאִימ֔וֹת <S%H8382><s%> whereof every one beareth twins וְשַׁכֻּלָ֖ה <S%H7909><s%> and [there is] not one barren אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> one בָּהֶֽם׃
כְּפֶ֤לַח <S%H6400><s%> As a piece הָרִמּוֹן֙ <S%H7416><s%> of a pomegranate רַקָּתֵ֔ךְ <S%H7541><s%> [are] thy temples מִבַּ֖עַד <S%H1157><s%> within לְצַמָּתֵֽךְ׃ <S%H6777><s%> thy locks

שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> There are threescore הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> There מְּלָכ֔וֹת <S%H4436><s%> queens וּשְׁמֹנִ֖ים <S%H8084><s%> and fourscore פִּֽילַגְשִׁ֑ים <S%H6370><s%> concubines וַעֲלָמ֖וֹת <S%H5959><s%> and virgins אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> without מִסְפָּֽר׃ <S%H4557><s%> without number

אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> is [but] one הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he יוֹנָתִ֣י <S%H3123><s%> My dove תַמָּתִ֔י <S%H8535><s%> my undefiled אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> she [is] the [only] one הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> is her לְאִמָּ֔הּ <S%H517><s%> of her mother בָּרָ֥ה <S%H1249><s%> she [is] the choice הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> who לְיֽוֹלַדְתָּ֑הּ <S%H3205><s%> [one] of her that bare רָא֤וּהָ <S%H7200><s%> saw בָנוֹת֙ <S%H1323><s%> her The daughters וַֽיְאַשְּׁר֔וּהָ <S%H833><s%> her and blessed מְלָכ֥וֹת <S%H4436><s%> her [yea] the queens וּפִֽילַגְשִׁ֖ים <S%H6370><s%> and the concubines וַֽיְהַלְלֽוּהָ׃ <S%H1984><s%> and they praised ס

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> that הַנִּשְׁקָפָ֖ה <S%H8259><s%> Who [is] she [that] looketh forth כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like שָׁ֑חַר <S%H7837><s%> as the morning יָפָ֣ה <S%H3303><s%> fair כַלְּבָנָ֗ה <S%H3842><s%> as the moon בָּרָה֙ <S%H1249><s%> clear כַּֽחַמָּ֔ה <S%H2535><s%> as the sun אֲיֻמָּ֖ה <S%H366><s%> [and] terrible כַּנִּדְגָּלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1713><s%> as [an army] with banners ס

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into גִּנַּ֤ת <S%H1594><s%> into the garden אֱגוֹז֙ <S%H93><s%> of nuts יָרַ֔דְתִּי <S%H3381><s%> I went down לִרְא֖וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see בְּאִבֵּ֣י <S%H3><s%> the fruits הַנָּ֑חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the valley לִרְאוֹת֙ <S%H7200><s%> [and] to see הֲפָֽרְחָ֣ה <S%H6524><s%> flourished הַגֶּ֔פֶן <S%H1612><s%> whether the vine הֵנֵ֖צוּ <S%H5132><s%> budded הָרִמֹּנִֽים׃ <S%H7416><s%> [and] the pomegranates

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> Or ever I was aware נַפְשִׁ֣י <S%H5315><s%> my soul שָׂמַ֔תְנִי <S%H7760><s%> made מַרְכְּב֖וֹת <S%H4818><s%> me [like] the chariots עַמִּי־ <S%H5971><s%> people נָדִֽיב׃ <S%H5081><s%> of my noble

שׁ֤וּבִי <S%H7725><s%> Return שׁ֙וּבִי֙ <S%H7725><s%> return הַשּׁ֣וּלַמִּ֔ית <S%H7759><s%> O Shulamite שׁ֥וּבִי <S%H7725><s%> return שׁ֖וּבִי <S%H7725><s%> return וְנֶחֱזֶה־ <S%H2372><s%> that we may look בָּ֑ךְ מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why תֶּחֱזוּ֙ <S%H2372><s%> upon thee What will ye see בַּשּׁ֣וּלַמִּ֔ית <S%H7759><s%> the Shulammite כִּמְחֹלַ֖ת <S%H4246><s%> the dance הַֽמַּחֲנָֽיִם׃ <S%H4264><s%> of two armies
